g++ -O3 -DNDEBUG CMakeFiles/EGSM.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/EGSM.dir/graph/graph.cpp.o CMakeFiles/EGSM.dir/graph/operations.cpp.o CMakeFiles/EGSM.dir/cmake_device_link.o -o EGSM   -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/graph-matching-analysis/baseline_algorithms/EGSM/build liblink.a libnd.so -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
